duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-level technical guidance and support to customers
Partner with Account Management to discover customer priorities and needs
Recommend and develop appropriate customer solution offerings
Support in relationship building and discovery across all relevant technology teams in a customer
Identify opportunities and define solution options
Create and execute technical account plan while influencing the overall account plan
Advocate for customers through adoption and operation of Cisco solutions

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Computer Science (Master's preferred)
